Pre-Game Insights: Faroe Islands are last in their four-team group with one point from two games, while Armenia are second with three points.
Faroe Islands lost 1-0 against Latvia in their last Nations League match.
Faroe Islands drew 1-1 with North Macedonia in their first game of the 2024-25 tournament.
Faroe Islands finished third in their group in the 2022-23 Nations League with eight points from six games.
Faroe Islands have lost 12, drawn two, and won just one of their last 15 fixtures.
Faroe Islands have lost four and drawn one of their last five home games.
Armenia lost 2-0 against North Macedonia in their last match despite having a player advantage for the second half.
Armenia were relegated from League B to League C in the 2022-23 Nations League.
Armenia's coach Oleksandr Petrakov was appointed in January 2023.
Armenia have won two of their three most recent matches.
Armenia have lost their last six away fixtures.
